item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_OneTime
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_OneTime Service Datatype Description Local createDate When this trigger was created. Type: dateTime date The date to execute the policy. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion. Type: boolean
